## open-microsoft-edge.ps1 - Launches Microsoft Edge

This script launches the Microsoft Edge Web browser.

## Parameters
```powershell

[<CommonParameters>]

    WarningVariable, OutBuffer, PipelineVariable, and OutVariable.
```

## Example
```powershell
PS> ./open-microsoft-edge

```
